japanese:
（……あれ？
　フータロー、もしかして……）
translation:
(...Huh?
 Could Futaro be...)

japanese:
あれ？
お兄ちゃん、寝ちゃったね。
translation:
Huh?
Big bro fell asleep.

japanese: やっぱり疲れてたんだ。
translation: He must have been tired.

japanese:
無理もないよ。
７人分のお弁当をここまで１人で運んだんだもん。
translation:
It's no wonder, though.
He carried seven bento boxes
all the way here by himself.

japanese:
（ううん、きっとそれだけじゃない。
　昨日、夜遅くまで起きてたから……）
translation:
(No, it's probably not just that.
 He stayed up pretty late last night...)

japanese: とりあえず、このまま寝かせておいてあげましょ。
translation: For now, let's just let him sleep like this.

japanese:
……ところで？
これって、フー君の無防備な寝顔が見られる
絶好のチャンスよね？
translation:
...By the way?
Isn't this a perfect opportunity
to see Fu-kun's defenseless sleeping face?

japanese:
はわっ！
二乃がいつになく悪い顔をしてる！
translation:
HA-WHAA?!
Nino, this is so unlike you! 
You're making such a devious face!

japanese:
ですが、スマホは別荘では？
バッテリーがどうとかで。
translation:
Didn't you leave your smartphone at the villa?
You said the battery was pretty much dead.

japanese: あっ！？　そうだった……。
translation: Ah! That's right...

japanese:
も～っ！　タイミング悪いわね！
スマホがあれば撮り放題だったのに。
translation:
Ugh! Bad timing!
If I had my smartphone,
I could have taken so many pictures.

japanese: 残念だったねぇ、二乃。
translation: That's too bad, huh Nino.

japanese:
（これだけみんなで話してるのに
　全然起きない……）
translation:
(Everyone is talking so much,
 but Futaro won't wake up at all...)

japanese: （こんな態勢で寝てたら、疲れも取れないよね）
translation:
(If he stays in this position,
 he'll just end up more tired when he wakes up...)

japanese:
（だから、これはフータローのため。
　決して私が膝枕をしたいわけじゃないから）
translation:
(This is for Futaro's sake.
 It's not like I WANT him to use my lap as a pillow.)

japanese:
み～く～？
フー君に近づいて、何をしようとしてるのかしら？
translation:
Miiikuuu?
Getting close to Fu-kun like that,
are you planning on doing something?

japanese: ち、違う、これは……！
translation: N-no, it's not what it...!

japanese:
そんな誤魔化さなくても、みんな、わかってるから。
フータロー君に膝枕してあげようとしてたんでしょ？
translation:
You don't have to hide it, everyone knows.
You were trying to get Futaro-kun
to use your lap as a pillow, right?

japanese: な、なんでわかって……。
translation: H-how did you know...?

japanese: さすがにこれはわかりますよ。
translation: It's pretty obvious, you know.

japanese:
で、でも違うから。
私はただ、もっと寝やすい態勢に
してあげようとしてただけだから。
translation:
B-but, it's not what you think.
I was just trying to help him
get into a more comfortable sleeping position.

japanese: そっか、三玖は優しいね。
translation: Is that so. Miku, you're so kind!

japanese: うう……。
translation: Ooohh...

japanese:
そういえばさ、三玖はずっと
フータロー君のことを気にかけてたけど、
もしかして、何かあったの？
translation:
By the way, Miku,
you've been worried about Futaro-kun for a while.
Did something happen?

japanese:
フータローが疲れてるのは、
きっと山登りだけが原因じゃないから。
translation:
I don't think Futaro's fatigue
is solely due to mountain climbing.

japanese: え？　どうして？
translation: Huh? Why?

japanese:
フータロー、昨日も夜遅くまで
私たちのために復習用の問題集を作ってた。
translation:
Futaro stayed up late last night
making self-made problems for us to review.

japanese: 実力テスト、のですか？
translation: For the academic ability test?

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.

japanese:
まったく、上杉君は。
想い出作りを提案したのはそちらだというのに。
translation:
My goodness, Uesugi-kun.
He's the one that suggested we make some memories.

japanese:
というか、そもそもこの島に来たのだって
フー君へのお礼だったのに。
translation:
Actually, we came to this island in the first place
to show our appreciation to Fu-kun.

japanese:
でも島から出られなくなったから……
また、フータローに頼りっぱなしになっちゃって。
translation:
But, we got stranded here...
and now we're relying on him all the time.

japanese:
状況が状況だから仕方ないけど……
ホント、頑張りすぎなのよ。
translation:
Well, it can't be helped given the situation...
but, he really is pushing himself too hard.

japanese: それが上杉さんらしいけどね。
translation: That's just like Uesugi-san, though.

japanese:
私はね、みんなの気持ちは
お兄ちゃんに充分、伝わってると思うよ？
translation:
I think big bro knows how much
everyone appreciates him, you know?

japanese: そうなの？
translation: Is that so?

japanese:
うん、でもうちのお兄ちゃんは
困ったところがあって――
素直にお礼を言ったりできないんだ。
translation:
Yes, but frankly, he has a hard time%p-2;――
%p;expressing his gratitude.

japanese:
だねぇ。
まあ、男の子って
そういうものなのかもしれないけど。
translation:
Right.
Well, boys might just be like that.

japanese:
むしろ、こんなお兄ちゃんと一緒にいてくれる
三玖さんたちがすごいなって思うもん。
translation:
On the other hand, I think you guys are all amazing
that you can spend time with big bro like this.

japanese:
できたら、こんなお兄ちゃんと
これからも仲良くしてあげてください。
translation:
If possible, please continue to be friends
with him like this from now on.

japanese: ら、らいはちゃん……！
translation: R-Raiha-chan!

japanese:
うううっ！　なんて健気なんでしょう！
やっぱりうちの子になってほしいです～！！
translation:
Oooooohh! How admirable!
I really want you to become a member of our family!!

japanese:
わわっ！？
よ、四葉さん、苦しいよ～！
translation:
GWAAAA?!
Y-Yotsuba-san, you're suffocating me!

japanese:
大丈夫だよ、らいはちゃん。
そう簡単に私たちとフータロー君の関係は
なくなったりしない。
translation:
It's okay, Raiha-chan.
Our relationship with Futaro-kun won't be easily broken.

japanese:
むしろ、フー君が嫌って言っても
卒業まではとことん付き合ってもらうわ。
translation:
Rather, even if he says he hates us,
we'll stick with him until the end.

japanese:
うん、心配いらない。
私たちはこれからも一緒だから。
translation:
Yep, you don't need to worry.
We'll be together from here on out.

japanese:
（そう。
　これからも、ずっと……）
translation:
(That's right.
 From here on out...)

japanese: ……フータローと、一緒にいたいな。
translation: ...I'd really like to be with you, Futaro.
